client_profile_secondary_school_name: Istituto Magistrale Statale Maria Gaetana Agnesi Genova
client_description_Summary_Note:
Ilaria Chiara Donati and the RM were introduced at an art auction in Rome. They bonded over their appreciation for contemporary art and exchanged contact information to discuss potential collaborations.
Ilaria Chiara Donati is a 64 year old retired CEO from Italy. She has a diverse background, having worked in various capacities and gained extensive knowledge in the field.
She was drawn to Julius Baer's holistic financial planning and investment strategies, prompting the decision to join.
client_description_Family_Background: Ilaria Chiara Donati is currently divorced. She does not have any children.
client_description_Education_Background:
Ilaria completed her secondary education at Istituto Magistrale Statale Maria Gaetana Agnesi Genova in 1978.
Ilaria finished her studies at Luiss Guido Carli in 1983.
client_description_Occupation_History:
Ilaria Chiara Donati is a 64 year old retired CEO from Italy.
Ilaria Chiara Donati began her professional journey as a Drilling Engineer at ENI S.p.A. in 1984, laying the foundation for future success.
At ERGA S.p.A., she held the position of Reservoir Engineer from 1991 to 1995, making significant contributions to the organization.
At ERGA S.p.A., she worked as a Operations Manager from 1995 to 1996, focusing on strategic initiatives and team collaboration.
In 1996, she transitioned to Edison S.p.A. to take on the position of VP of Exploration, capitalizing on her expertise to propel business growth.
Ilaria Chiara Donati concluded her career as a CEO at SNAM S.p.A., where she worked from 1999 until retirement.
client_description_Wealth_Summary:
She managed to save approximately 1490000 EUR from her earnings at all companies.
She owns flat in Modena, where she resides. It is worth 626000 EUR.

She purchased townhouse in Parma, where she spends her holidays. It is valued at 1204000 EUR.
She does not have any inheritances.
client_description_Client_Summary: Given the client's impressive career history and financial discipline, we are confident in her ability to achieve financial success and security.
